entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Upsala
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:12 AM CST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -25.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Upsala 11:00 AM CST Monday 30 January 2023
Temperature: -25.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.6 kPa rising
Humidity: 65 %
Wind Chill: -36
Dewpoint: -30.2°C
Wind: WSW 14 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Sunny. High minus 22.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind west 20 km/h. High minus 22. Wind chill minus 44 this morning and minus 30 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h late this evening. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Clearing. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 38 in the morning and minus 24 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Monday 30 January 2023
